wizard.title: Setup Steps
wizard.description: Follow these steps to configure your workspace.

workspace-basics.title: Workspace Basics
workspace-basics.shortDescription: Configure your workspace name and settings
workspace-basics.description: Set up the foundational settings for your workspace including name, timezone, and default preferences.

invite-users.title: Invite Users
invite-users.shortDescription: Add team members to your workspace
invite-users.description: Invite your team members by email. You can assign roles and permissions during or after the invitation process.

create-teams.title: Create Teams
create-teams.description: Create teams to organize your users. Teams help manage permissions and collaboration across your workspace.

configure-email.title: Configure Email & Notifications
configure-email.shortDescription: Set up email templates and notifications
configure-email.description: Customize email templates for invitations, notifications, and system messages. Configure notification preferences for your workspace.

review-security.title: Review Security
review-security.description: Review and configure security settings including password policies, session management, and access controls.

explore-apps.title: Explore Apps
explore-apps.description: Explore the available applications in your workspace including Calendar, Kanban, Chat, and more.

preview.selectStep: Select a step to see more details

workspace-basics.title: About Workspace Basics
workspace-basics.explanation: The workspace basics step helps you establish the foundation of your admin environment. This includes naming your workspace and setting default preferences.
workspace-basics.tip: Choose a clear, recognizable name that your team will easily identify.

invite-users.title: About Inviting Users
invite-users.explanation: Adding users is essential to get your team onboarded. You can invite users individually or in bulk, and assign them appropriate roles.
invite-users.tip: Start with a small group of key users to test your setup before inviting everyone.

create-teams.title: About Creating Teams
create-teams.explanation: Teams help you organize users and manage permissions efficiently. Create teams based on departments, projects, or any grouping that makes sense for your organization.
create-teams.tip: Keep team structures simple at first. You can always reorganize later.

configure-email.title: About Email Configuration
configure-email.explanation: Email templates ensure consistent communication with your users. Customize templates for various scenarios like invitations, password resets, and notifications.
configure-email.tip: Preview your emails before going live to ensure they look professional.

review-security.title: About Security Settings
review-security.explanation: Security settings protect your workspace and user data. Review these settings to ensure they meet your organization's requirements.
review-security.tip: Balance security with usability. Too strict policies may frustrate users.

explore-apps.title: About Available Apps
explore-apps.explanation: Your workspace includes several applications to enhance productivity. Explore each app to understand how they can benefit your team.
explore-apps.tip: Enable apps gradually and train your team on each one before adding more.

completion.title: You're all set!
completion.description: Your workspace is configured and ready for your team. Choose how you'd like to continue.
